title: A courtly controuersie, betweene looue and learning Pleasauntlie passed in disputation, betweene a ladie and a gentleman of Scienna. Wherein is no offence offered to the vertuous nor any ill motion to delight the vicious.
author: Munday, Anthony, 1553-1633.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Iohn Charlewood, for Henrie Carre, dwelling in the olde Chaunge, at the signe of the three Connies,
